backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining product, enquiry, feedback, message, and settings types with maps, comparison helpers, storage mixins, and access‑controlled user profile methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, affected files, components, and test mappings for admin authentication fixes and error reporting.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing each frontend file's purpose across pages, hooks, components, and layouts.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide for Version 24 describing pre‑deployment checks, deployment steps, verification, troubleshooting, and rollback.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with extensive OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and global layout defaults.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, favicon, root div, and script loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for public and admin pages with AdminRouteGuard and wraps the app in ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button that manages identity state, clears admin session, and resets React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal that prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter their name and saves it via API hooks.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer displaying branding, navigation links, contact info, and a credits section.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Main layout with top navigation, footer, WhatsApp button, and a connectivity preflight check using the actor.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Responsive top navigation bar with links, mobile menu toggle, logo, and login button.
frontend/src/components/whatsapp/WhatsAp: Floating WhatsApp button that builds a chat URL using site settings and opens WhatsApp.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, including access control initialization and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReady.ts: Provides a hook and utility to poll until the backend actor is ready, with timeout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminActor.ts: Creates an admin-specific actor without secret-token initialization for passkey-based admin authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Tracks and reacts to admin session unlock state changes using a subscription.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Provides admin authorization utilities, including passkey verification, admin session handling, and user profile queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity state, login, logout, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating products, prices, enquiries, and admin-protected operations using actor instances.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining light/dark theme variables, typography styles, and utility layers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard with tabbed navigation for products, enquiries, and settings panels.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEnquiriesP: Wrapper page that renders the enquiries admin panel.
Fetches and displays all enquiries in a table with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminFeedbackPa: Fetches and displays customer feedback in a table with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayoutPage: Admin layout with navigation, logout handling, and routing to various admin pages.
Admin login flow using passkey verification, session handling, and redirect logic.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminMessagesPa: Fetches and displays contact form messages in a table with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Simple wrapper that renders the AdminProductsPanel component.
Displays product list and provides a form to add new products with photo upload and progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRouteGuard: Guards admin routes by checking session unlock state and redirecting to login when needed.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: Loads, displays, and updates site-wide settings through a managed form with error and success handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminTwoStepAcc: Renders a passkey prompt UI for admin access with validation and error categorization.
frontend/src/pages/AdvantagesPage.tsx: Displays a styled grid of HDPE pipe advantages with icons and descriptive text.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, message submission, and connection status checks using backend hooks.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero, feature list, about section, and navigation CTAs for products, orders, and contact.
frontend/src/pages/OrderEnquiryPage.tsx: Customer order/quote form with file upload, validation, and enquiry submission using backend hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Displays product list with loading states, product details, and optional certification badge.
Shows a grid of predefined HDPE pipe application categories with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/utils/adminCredentials.ts: Provides a static admin passkey and a verification helper.
frontend/src/utils/adminReturnPath.ts: Stores and retrieves the admin return path using sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/adminSession.ts: Manages admin unlock state with sessionStorage and a custom event subscription system.
frontend/src/utils/buildInfo.ts: Defines build metadata and utilities for logging build information and environment labels.
frontend/src/utils/sanitizeError.ts: Sanitizes error messages by redacting sensitive patterns, URLs, and overly long text.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL and hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear stored or hash-based values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, known issues, and feature requirements related to fixing production admin login failures.
